trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around April 9th 2011
Summary: It was a green cigar shaped object that looked like it had been crashed before
divs: Sighting Detailsit had a green light on the back and was a cigar shape. it also looked as if it had been wrecked befor it was slightly cracked and dented some what. It flew over me at about 100 feet or so. The sighting was located in the county near New Buckley rd.
